verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> their armies <S%H4264><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> and were gathered together <S%H622><s%> at Shochoh, <S%H7755><s%> which <S%H834><s%> belongeth to Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Shochoh <S%H7755><s%> and Azekah, <S%H5825><s%> in Ephes-dammim. <S%H658><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gathered together, <S%H622><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> by the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Elah, <S%H425><s%> and set the battle <S%H4421><s%> in array <S%H6186><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> on <S%H413><s%> a mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the one side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> on <S%H413><s%> a mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the other side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and there was a valley <S%H1516><s%> between <S%H996><s%> them.

And there went out <S%H3318><s%> a champion <S%H376><s%> <S%H1143><s%> out of the camp <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> named <S%H8034><s%> Goliath, <S%H1555><s%> of Gath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1661><s%> whose height <S%H1363><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> and a span. <S%H2239><s%>

And he had a helmet <S%H3553><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> was armed <S%H3847><s%> with a coat <S%H8302><s%> of mail; <S%H7193><s%> and the weight <S%H4948><s%> of the coat <S%H8302><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>
And he had greaves <S%H4697><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his legs, <S%H7272><s%> and a target <S%H3591><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> between <S%H996><s%> his shoulders. <S%H3802><s%>

And the staff <S%H2671><s%> of his spear <S%H2595><s%> was like a weaver's <S%H707><s%> beam; <S%H4500><s%> and his spear's <S%H2595><s%> head <S%H3852><s%> weighed six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of iron: <S%H1270><s%> and one bearing <S%H5375><s%> a shield <S%H6793><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And he stood <S%H5975><s%> and cried <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Why <S%H4100><s%> are ye come out <S%H3318><s%> to set your battle <S%H4421><s%> in array? <S%H6186><s%> am not <S%H3808><s%> I <S%H595><s%> a Philistine, <S%H6430><s%> and ye <S%H859><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> to Saul? <S%H7586><s%> choose <S%H1262><s%> you a man <S%H376><s%> for you, and let him come down <S%H3381><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me.

If <S%H518><s%> he be able <S%H3201><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, and to kill <S%H5221><s%> me, then will we be <S%H1961><s%> your servants: <S%H5650><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> I <S%H589><s%> prevail <S%H3201><s%> against him, and kill <S%H5221><s%> him, then shall ye be <S%H1961><s%> our servants, <S%H5650><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> us.

And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> defy <S%H2778><s%> <S%H853><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me a man, <S%H376><s%> that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

When Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of the Philistine, <S%H6430><s%> they were dismayed, <S%H2865><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> afraid. <S%H3372><s%>

Now David <S%H1732><s%> was the son <S%H1121><s%> of that <S%H2088><s%> Ephrathite <S%H376><s%> <S%H673><s%> of Bethlehem-judah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Jesse; <S%H3448><s%> and he had eight <S%H8083><s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H935><s%> among men <S%H376><s%> for an old <S%H2204><s%> man in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Saul. <S%H7586><s%>

And the three <S%H7969><s%> eldest <S%H1419><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to the battle: <S%H4421><s%> and the names <S%H8034><s%> of his three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> that <S%H834><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%> were Eliab <S%H446><s%> the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> and next <S%H4932><s%> unto him Abinadab, <S%H41><s%> and the third <S%H7992><s%> Shammah. <S%H8048><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> was the youngest: <S%H6996><s%> and the three <S%H7969><s%> eldest <S%H1419><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> Saul. <S%H7586><s%>

But David <S%H1732><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> at Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>
And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> morning <S%H7925><s%> and evening, <S%H6150><s%> and presented himself <S%H3320><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And Jesse <S%H3448><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> for thy brethren <S%H251><s%> an ephah <S%H374><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> parched <S%H7039><s%> corn, and these <S%H2088><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> loaves, <S%H3899><s%> and run <S%H7323><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to thy brethren; <S%H251><s%>

And carry <S%H935><s%> these <S%H428><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cheeses <S%H2757><s%> <S%H2461><s%> unto the captain <S%H8269><s%> of their thousand, <S%H505><s%> and look how <S%H6485><s%> thy brethren <S%H251><s%> fare, <S%H7965><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> their pledge. <S%H6161><s%>

Now Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and they, <S%H1992><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> were in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Elah, <S%H425><s%> fighting <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and left <S%H5203><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> a keeper, <S%H8104><s%> and took, <S%H5375><s%> and went, <S%H1980><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Jesse <S%H3448><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; and he came <S%H935><s%> to the trench, <S%H4570><s%> as the host <S%H2428><s%> was going forth <S%H3318><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the fight, <S%H4634><s%> and shouted <S%H7321><s%> for the battle. <S%H4421><s%>
For Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had put the battle in array, <S%H6186><s%> army <S%H4634><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> army. <S%H4634><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> left <S%H5203><s%> <S%H853><s%> his carriage <S%H3627><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the carriage, <S%H3627><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> into the army, <S%H4634><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> and saluted <S%H7592><s%> <S%H7965><s%> his brethren. <S%H251><s%>

And as he <S%H1931><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came up <S%H5927><s%> the champion, <S%H376><s%> <S%H1143><s%> the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> of Gath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1661><s%> Goliath <S%H1555><s%> by name, <S%H8034><s%> out of the armies <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4630><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> according to the same <S%H428><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> them.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the man, <S%H376><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and were sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid. <S%H3372><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Have ye seen <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> man <S%H376><s%> that is come up? <S%H5927><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> to defy <S%H2778><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> is he come up: <S%H5927><s%> and it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> killeth <S%H5221><s%> him, the king <S%H4428><s%> will enrich <S%H6238><s%> him with great <S%H1419><s%> riches, <S%H6239><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> him his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall be done <S%H6213><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> killeth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H1975><s%> Philistine, <S%H6430><s%> and taketh away <S%H5493><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Israel? <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> Philistine, <S%H6430><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he should defy <S%H2778><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God? <S%H430><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> him after this <S%H2088><s%> manner, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> So <S%H3541><s%> shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> killeth <S%H5221><s%> him.

And Eliab <S%H446><s%> his eldest <S%H1419><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> when he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the men; <S%H376><s%> and Eliab's <S%H446><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against David, <S%H1732><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> camest thou down <S%H3381><s%> hither? and with <S%H5921><s%> whom <S%H4310><s%> hast thou left <S%H5203><s%> those <S%H2007><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> in the wilderness? <S%H4057><s%> I <S%H589><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy pride, <S%H2087><s%> and the naughtiness <S%H7455><s%> of thine heart; <S%H3824><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou art come down <S%H3381><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mightest see <S%H7200><s%> the battle. <S%H4421><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have I now <S%H6258><s%> done? <S%H6213><s%> Is there not <S%H3808><s%> a cause? <S%H1697><s%>

And he turned <S%H5437><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H681><s%> him toward another, <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H312><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> after the same <S%H2088><s%> manner: <S%H1697><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H1697><s%> him again <S%H7725><s%> after the former <S%H7223><s%> manner. <S%H1697><s%>

And when the words <S%H1697><s%> were heard <S%H8085><s%> which <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> spoke, <S%H1696><s%> they rehearsed <S%H5046><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Saul: <S%H7586><s%> and he sent <S%H3947><s%> for him.

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> Let no <S%H408><s%> man's <S%H120><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> fail <S%H5307><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of him; thy servant <S%H5650><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Philistine. <S%H6430><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> Thou art not <S%H3808><s%> able <S%H3201><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> against <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Philistine <S%H6430><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him: for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art but a youth, <S%H5288><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> from his youth. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> kept <S%H1961><s%> <S%H7462><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and there came <S%H935><s%> a lion, <S%H738><s%> and a bear, <S%H1677><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> a lamb <S%H7716><s%> out of the flock: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5739><s%>

And I went out <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, and smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> it out of his mouth: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%> and when he arose <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, I caught <S%H2388><s%> him by his beard, <S%H2206><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and slew <S%H4191><s%> him.

Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> the lion <S%H738><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> the bear: <S%H1677><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> Philistine <S%H6430><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them, seeing <S%H3588><s%> he hath defied <S%H2778><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H834><s%> delivered <S%H5337><s%> me out of the paw <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the lion, <S%H738><s%> and out of the paw <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the bear, <S%H1677><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> will deliver <S%H5337><s%> me out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> Philistine. <S%H6430><s%> And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> Go, <S%H1980><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> armed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H853><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> with his armor, <S%H4055><s%> and he put <S%H5414><s%> a helmet <S%H6959><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his head; <S%H7218><s%> also he armed <S%H3847><s%> him with a coat of mail. <S%H8302><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> girded <S%H2296><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> upon <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> his armor, <S%H4055><s%> and he attempted <S%H2974><s%> to go; <S%H1980><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he had not <S%H3808><s%> proved <S%H5254><s%> it. And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> I cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> with these; <S%H428><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> proved <S%H5254><s%> them. And David <S%H1732><s%> put <S%H5493><s%> them off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> his staff <S%H4731><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and chose <S%H977><s%> him five <S%H2568><s%> smooth <S%H2512><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the brook, <S%H5158><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them in a shepherd's <S%H7462><s%> bag <S%H3627><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had, even in a scrip; <S%H3219><s%> and his sling <S%H7050><s%> was in his hand: <S%H3027><s%> and he drew near <S%H5066><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the Philistine. <S%H6430><s%>

And the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H1980><s%> on <S%H1980><s%> and drew near <S%H7131><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> David; <S%H1732><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> the shield <S%H6793><s%> went before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And when the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> looked about, <S%H5027><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> he disdained <S%H959><s%> him: for <S%H3588><s%> he was <S%H1961><s%> but a youth, <S%H5288><s%> and ruddy, <S%H132><s%> and of <S%H5973><s%> a fair <S%H3303><s%> countenance. <S%H4758><s%>
